pageDescription: Manage multisig proposals and fund withdrawals from the staking pool

auth.loginRequired: Please log in to access the multisig management page
auth.walletRequiredDesc: Please connect your Solana wallet to access multisig management features
auth.walletRequiredNote: Only authorized multisig members can access this page
auth.accessDeniedDesc: Your wallet address is not in the authorized multisig member list

config.title: Multisig Configuration
multisigInfoDesc: • Any multisig member can create proposals
• Requires at least {{threshold}} member signatures to execute proposals
• Only AdminWithdraw type proposals can withdraw funds
• All operations are recorded on the blockchain, completely transparent

proposals.title: Proposal Management
proposals.noProposalsDesc: No proposals have been created yet, click the "Create Proposal" tab to get started
proposals.enterRecipientAccount: Please enter recipient token account address:

createProposal.title: Create Admin Withdrawal Proposal
proposalInfoDesc: • After creating a proposal, at least {{threshold}} multisig members need to sign
• The proposal creator will automatically sign, other members need to sign
• Once the signature threshold is reached, any multisig member can execute the proposal
• Withdrawn funds will be transferred from the staking pool token vault to the specified address
createProposal.withdrawAmountNote: Minimum amount: 0.000001 CFX, Maximum amount: 1,000,000 CFX
createProposal.recipientAddressNote: Please ensure the address is correct, funds will be transferred to this address
createProposal.proposalDescriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the purpose and use of this withdrawal
createProposal.proposalDescriptionNote: Description is for record keeping only, not stored on blockchain
riskWarningDesc: • Please carefully verify the recipient address, transfers cannot be reversed
• Ensure withdrawal amount is reasonable to avoid affecting normal staking pool operations
• All proposals are recorded on the blockchain, completely transparent and public
• Malicious or inappropriate proposals may be rejected by other multisig members

errors.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid withdrawal amount
errors.amountTooLarge: Single withdrawal amount cannot exceed 1,000,000 CFX
errors.onlyMultisigMembers: Only multisig members can create proposals
